column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We started with just three oysters
column3: at home in other restaurants-I usually can only "handle" one-eating them out of pressure from everyone around marveling over them
column5: but question why all oysters can't be like the ones at bavettes.  We also ordered the avocado crab salad
column6: hands down the best salad I've ever eaten
column9: our waiter made sure our napkins were folded every time we stepped away from the table
column10: talk about service! He made great drink recommendations and was genuinely interested in our satisfaction.  I couldn't recommend this place more! It is a must when traveling here
column11: be prepared to spend a bit
column12: but it's worth every penny.  Easily one of the best nights of my life
column13: and the food just enhanced it!
